website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Sole Fury is a running-inspired silhouette that has a sleek design. Whether on the streets or working out, this sneaker will not come up short.It is a viable option as a Reebok casual shoe because of the clean-looking aesthetic and versatility. For working out, it has been proven by many that all the essential features are covered.  Considering all of its pros and cons, there aren’t a lot of footwear that bears the same attributes as the Reebok Sole Fury.
pros: A lot of wearers have complimented the amount of cushioning provided by the shoe
The stylish design of the Reebok Sole Fury has enticed several shoppers to order a pair
For a significant number of users, the low-top is versatile as they found it easy to incorporate with their lifestyle clothes
One is particularly impressed with the split sole
The color options available for the Sole Fury are quite appealing, as per a number of commenters
A couple of wearers noticed that they got compliments while wearing the Reebok Sole Fury
Its breathability has been commended by a few purchasers
They mentioned that because it allows airflow, it is a great option for working out
Arch support has been adequate for a user who is flat-footed
As the shoe is endorsed by UFC superstar Conor Mcgregor, it convinced some shoppers to order a pair
Because of the overall features of the sneaker, there are a few who called the Sole Fury as their “favorite shoe ever.”
cons: The Reebok Sole Fury runs small, as per a few wearers
A buyer said that it could have been a better sneaker if the outsole is not all-white for the colorway Black / Red /White
Due to this aspect, it is very susceptible to get dirty easily

website_summaries.verdict: Many consumers agreed that the Reebok Sole Fury TS was supportive and comfortable to wear. Although a lot of runners were impressed with the shoe’s lightweight structure, durable outsole, and good cushioning system, there were some testers who were disappointed with the actual color and tilted toe box of the shoe. Reebok Sole Fury TS is an average running shoe, it is not perfect but worth the investment.
pros: Many people consider the Reebok Sole Fury TS to be a supportive and comfortable shoe to wear for their daily activities
This Reebok running shoe has a lightweight structure that makes it perfect for running and training sessions, according to several reviewers
The stretchable material at the front of Reebok Sole Fury TS makes it very easy to move around, said a user
A lot of consumers admire the overall design of this running shoe
The midsole of the Reebok Sole Fury TS was so soft yet stable, a runner stated
Some buyers have noted that, in terms of durability, this running companion is worth their money
Several purchasers commented that the shoe offers good amount of cushioning
cons: A user reported that toe box of Reebok Sole Fury TS is a bit tilted and it made the shoe uncomfortable
A few buyers have complained that the color of the shoe that they received didn’t match the visual representation in the web pages

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive shoe...took a few runs to get use to the split but love them !
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome shoe(my wife says so) but they are very aesthetically pleasing to look at. The fit is snug as it’s a sock type shoe but much thicker material than say some of the same type of Nike, The split sole took me a few runs to get use to, not uncomfortable just a different feel, I’d suggest a few jogs to get your gate use to the dynamics of the sole before going for a full run out of the gate but now they feel/function great. I only have 20+ miles on them so I can’t speak to longevity but at the price I paid (yes I bought them). I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Project collector

customer_reviews.title: Great Athletic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe...totally shocked by Reebok! This is a high quality athletic shoe. Arrive yesterday and I just ran 2.6 mile in them this morning. The white cushion in the sole makes the shoe super comfortable and they look sporty for casual wear...way to go Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Ahave E. Brown Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day and these shoes are lightweight and very comfortable. I have been very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears these for work in a hospital every day, comfortable and matches his scrubs!
customer_reviews.author: tlathrop

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: They look as good online as they do in person. Fit is great, very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: THE Best
customer_reviews.text: THE Most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. Light as a feather and seem to form to my foot. Wife and daughter said "no more dad shoes", so I ordered these. SO glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Bru2322

customer_reviews.title: No support at all. Cannot tighten.
customer_reviews.text: No ankle support whatsoever. Its more or less a sole with neoprene like material on your foot. You cant even really tighten it with the laces either. I wish i hadn't paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: It's painful.. because when you walk it bends in the middle which put all pressure on the middle of feet causing inflammation and easy to spraine ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoe I'm Able To Run Like Never Before
customer_reviews.text: Thank You Fits Very Well I'm Truly Grateful For This Product Happy Holidays
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Product did not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoe does not fit as expected, my foot hangs off the edge on both the left and right sides; so I am walking with my foot hanging over the sides
customer_reviews.author: Morris S Pate

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for working out
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. I originally bought these in women’s size for the gym and found these and bought them again.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINE K.

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Sole Fury Ts Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, joseph william Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, j.W. Foster and sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
